Structure# ISO18013MobileDocumentRequestScene

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
struct ISO18013MobileDocumentRequestScene<Content> where Content : Sendable, Content : View
```
